
## Similar Modes

---

**Note:** Adding a new AI mode is super simple! Just edit `backend/config/prompts.yaml` and add your mode following the existing format. See [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md#3-add-new-ai-modes--great-for-beginners) for details.
